title: Increment Function
description: This function computes the increment of a given integer value `X` based on a specified increment `D` and a modulus `M`. The function adds the values together and applies a modulo operation to ensure the result wraps around based on `M`.
name: INC

input.name: X
input.description: The initial integer value to be incremented.

input.name: D
input.description: The increment value that will be added to X.

input.name: M
input.description: The modulus value used for wrapping the result.

output.name: INC
output.description: The resulting value after incrementing X by D and applying modulo M.
